item.description:
Little Harbor Boathouse joins SUP East Coast Style in hosting a Learn-To-SUP (Stand Up Paddle Boarding), Sunset Row & Paddle OPEN HOUSE event. 

Saturday June 25th from 4-7 pm

FREE: everyone is welcome to this community wide event!

• Meet SUP East Coast Style Owners, Christos Douroudis & Leah Beth Goodman.

• Learn how to SUP. 

• Sunset Row & Paddle.

• Register for Adult and Paddling & Rowing Programs

• Sign up for paddling and rowing youth camps! 

• Make reservations for SUP Tours and Sunset Paddles!

Come try Walking on Water!

Join us for a summer of Paddling & Rowing at Little Harbor Boathouse! SUP East Coast Style brings Guided paddle tours, Youth Summer SUP Camps, Sunset Paddles and much more to LHB this season! More on the water sport fun at Little Harbor Boathouse!  

For more information, find SUP East Coast Style on facebook Supeastcoaststyle

Email: Supeastcoaststyle@gmail.com

Contact: Christos or Leah at 978-882-2109

group.name: Rowing Gals Community Rowing & Paddling Meetup

item.name: LHB Welcomes SUP East Coast Style: FREE Community Event & Sunset Row & Paddle
